intro: Schoepfia mexicana, commonly known as Mexican Schoepfia, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants such as buckwheat and knotweed. Its leaves are typically alternate, ovate to elliptic in shape, and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Schoepfia mexicana is often found in dry, rocky habitats and is adapted to thrive in arid environments.
